subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Eddy Curry is not an All-Star in the view of N.B.A. fans or coaches, with the notable exception of the fans who reside in the Knicks’ locker room and the coach who sits on the Knicks’ bench.
snippet: Eddy Curry is not an All-Star in the view of N.B.A. fans or coaches, with the notable exception of the fans who reside in the Knicks’ locker room and the coach who sits on the Knicks’ bench.
